page.title: 04THE CHURCH OF TIBBERTON 1
page.content: {RELIGION} {THE VICAR}-Rev.C.Robinson has been vicar for Tibberton for two years.He also covers Oddingley and Hanbury.He works in partnership and each covers 4 parishes.Lay people who are not trained help with readings and prayers {TRAVEL}-The vicar finds it hard covering more than 1 parish.On Sundays he has to drive 3.5 miles from one church to another arriving just on time for each service.He has to travel about 200 miles a week.This travelling time could be spent praying or studying. However, he has a cassette player in his car to listen to while driving.He finds that one can pray well in a car. {HISTORY}-The church was built in the 13th. century but destroyed by fire.The new church was built 150 years ago.
